# Nick Kulavic - AI Engineer & Full-Stack Developer

> Professional portfolio website for Nick Kulavic, an AI Engineer and Full-Stack Developer based in Denver, CO.

## About Nick Kulavic

Nick Kulavic is an AI & Full-Stack Developer with 14+ years of experience building enterprise applications and profitable SaaS ventures. He specializes in AWS, serverless architecture, and AI integration.

### Current Role
- **Position:** AI & Full-Stack Developer at Take3Tech (March 2025 - Present)
- **Focus:** Building LoanMaps (loan origination system) and RuleTool (AI-driven PDF processing)
- **Tech Stack:** Node.js, TypeScript, React, AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, AWS Bedrock, Claude AI
- **Achievements:** SOC 2 compliant systems, 500+ enterprise users, 99.9% uptime

### Entrepreneurship
- **MyFusion Solutions (2015-Present):** Founded API integration platform generating $1.2M+ revenue
- **ListBackup.ai (2023-Present):** Serverless SaaS for email list backup with AI classification

### Key Metrics
- $1.2M+ total revenue generated
- 500+ enterprise users served
- 2M+ monthly API requests handled
- 30+ platform integrations built
- 0 security breaches
- 14+ years of experience

### Technical Expertise
- **AI/ML:** AWS Bedrock, Claude AI, ChatGPT API, Prompt Engineering, Multi-Model AI Integration
- **Cloud:** AWS Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, S3, Cognito, CloudFront (10+ years)
- **Frontend:** React (7 years), Next.js (4 years), TypeScript (6 years), Tailwind CSS
- **Backend:** Node.js (10 years), REST API Design, Serverless Architecture
- **CRM/Integrations:** Infusionsoft/Keap, Salesforce, HubSpot, Twilio, SendGrid

### Certifications
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect (Professional Level)
- AWS Certified Developer (Associate Level)
- Infusionsoft Certified Partner (Expert Level, 10+ years)
- AI/ML Practitioner (AWS Bedrock, Claude AI)
- SOC 2 Compliance Implementation

### Target Roles
Nick is seeking opportunities as:
- AI Engineer
- Full-Stack Developer
- Technical Lead
- SaaS Founder/CTO

### Contact
- **Location:** Denver, CO
- **Availability:** Remote or Denver-based positions
